price: Basi tukamwokoa yeye na watu wake, isipo kuwa mkewe, alikuwa miongoni mwa walio bakia nyuma.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: Amri ya kuadhibiwa ilikwisha thibiti. Basi Sisi tukamwokoa Lut' na watu wake, isipo kuwa mkewe, kwani yeye alikuwa katika hao walio potea.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illā im'ra-atahu kānat mina al-ghābirīna
